cs_04_ari_001.content: How did you find us so quickly?

cs_04_elinor_002.content: Remember how the green lizard was camouflaged
and hard to find on the green mossy log?

cs_04_elinor_003.content: And Koa had a good hiding place because
his shirt was the same color as the wall!

cs_04_elinor_004.content: Let's dress up in clothes that look like
our hiding spots? Then we can hide better!

cs_04_lizzie_001.content: We told you we were good at this game!

cs_04_mary_001.content: We're goats, and goats can see really well.
